maqras.text: 38|21|tatha kya aaya aapake paas do pakshon ka samaachaar, jab ve deevaar phaandakar mehraab (vandana sthal) mein aa gaye

38|22|jab unhonne pravesh kiya daavood par, to vah ghabara gaya unase. unhonne kahaah dariye nahin. ham do paksh hain, atyaachaar kiya hai, hamamen se ek ne, doosare par. to aap nirnay kar den hamaare beech saty (nyaay) ke saath tatha anyaay na karen tatha hamen darsha den seedhee raah.
38|23|ye mera bhaee hai, isake paas ninnaanve bhed hain aur mere paas bhed hai. ye kahata hai ki vah (bhee) mujhe de do aur ye prabhaavashaalee ho gaya mujhapar baat karane mein.

38|24|daavood ne kahaah usane tumapar avashy atyaachaar kiya, tumhaaree bhed ko (milaane kee) maang karake apanee bhedon mein tatha bahut-se saajhee ek-doosare par etyaachaar karate hain, unake siva, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye aur bahut thode hain aise log aur daavood ne bhaanp lee ki hamane usakee pareeksha lee hai, to sahasa usane kshama yaachana kar lee aur gir gaya sajde mein tatha dhyaanamagn ho gaya.
38|25|to hamane kshama kar diya usake lie vah tatha usake lie hamaare paas nishchay saamipy hai tatha achchha sthaan.

38|26|he daood! hamane tujhe raajy diya hai dharatee mein. atah, nirnay kar, logon ke beech saty (nyaay) ke saath tatha anusaran na kar aakaanksha ka. anyatha, vah kupath kar degee tujhe allaah kee raah se. nihsandeh, jo kupath ho jaayenge allaah kee raah[1] se, to unheen ke lie ghor yaatana hai, is kaaran ki ve bhool gaye haisaab ka din.

38|27|tatha nahin paida kiya hai hamane aakaash aur dharatee ko tatha jo kuchh unake beech hai, vyarth. ye to unaka vichaar hai, jo kaafir ho gaye. to vinaash hai unake lie, jo kaafir ho gaye agni se.
38|28|kya ham kar denge unhen, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye, unake samaan, jo upadravee hain dharatee mein? ya kar denge aagyaakaariyon ko ullanghanakaariyon ke samaan
38|29|ye (quraan) ek shoobh pustak hai, jise hamane avatarit kiya hai aapakee or, taaki log vichaar karen usakee aayaton par aur taaki shiksha grahan karen matimaan.
38|30|tatha hamane pradaan kiya daavood ko sulaimaan (naamak putr). vah ati dhyaanamagn tha.
38|31|jab prastut kiye gaye usake samaksh sandhya ke samay sadhe hue vegagaamee ghode.
38|32|to kahaah mainne praathamikta dee in ghodon ke prem ko apane paalanahaar ke smaran par. yahaan tak ki ve ojhal ho gaye.
38|33|unhen vaapis lao mere paas. phir haath pherane lage unakee pindaliyon tatha gardanon par.
38|34|aur hamane pareeksha[1] lee sulaimaan kee tatha daal diya usake sinhaasan par ek dhad. phir vah dhyaanamagn ho gaya.
38|35|usane praarthana keeh he mere paalanahaar! mujhe kshama kar de tatha mujhe pradaan kar aisa raajy, jo uchit na ho kisee ke lie mere pashchaat. vaastav mein, too hee ati pradaata hai.
38|36|to hamane vash mein kar diya usake lie vaayu ko, jo chal rahee thee dheemee gati se usake aadesh se, vah jahaan chaahata.
38|37|tatha shaitaanon ko pratyek prakaar ke nirmaata tatha gota khor ko.
38|38|tatha doosaron ko bandhe hue bediyon mein.
38|39|ye hamaara pradaan hai. to upakaar karo athava rok lo, koee haisaab nahin.
38|40|aur vaastav mein, usake lie hamaare paas saamipy tatha uttam sthaan hai.
38|41|tatha yaad karo hamaare bhakt ayyoob ko. jab usane pukaara apane paalanahaar ko ki shaitaan ne mujhe pahunchaaya[1] hai duhkh tatha yaatana.
38|42|apana paanv (dharatee par) maar. ye hai sheetal snaan tatha peene ka jal.
38|43|aur hamane pradaan kiya use usaka parivaar tatha unake saath aur unake samaan, apanee daya se aur matimaanon kee shiksha ke lie.
38|44|tatha le apane haath mein teeliyon kee ek jhaad tatha usase maar aur apanee shapath bhang na kar. vaastav[1] mein, hamane use paaya dhairyavaan. nishchay, vah bada dhyaanamagn tha.
38|45|tatha yaad karo hamaare bhakt ibraaheem, ishaaq evan yaaqoob ko, jo karm shakti tatha gyaanachakshoo[1] vaale the.
38|46|hamane use vishesh kar liya badee visheshata, paralok (aakhirat) kee yaad ke saath.
38|47|vaastav mein, vah hamaare yahaan uttam nirvaachiton mein se the.
38|48|tatha aap charcha karen ismaeel, yas evan zulkifl kee aur ye sabhee nirvaachiton mein se the.
38|49|ye (quraan) ek shiksha hai tatha nishchay aagyaakaariyon ke lie uttam sthaan hai.
38|50|sthaayee svarg, khule hue hain unake lie (unake) dvaar.
38|51|ve takiye lagaaye honge unamen. maangenge unamen bahut-se phal tatha pey padaarth.
